originalText.text: Жаннa просто золотая! She was incredibly helpful and considered. Made everything so uncomplicated, easy and fast. She came out of her way to meet me several times during her time off. Zhanna truly cares! I can’t recommend her enough!

originalText.text: I needed a foreign document translation fast and Jhanna provided that rush service. Highly recommend.

text.text: I needed a foreign document translation fast and Jhanna provided that rush service. Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
I needed to translate from Russian to English a very long difficult and convoluted personal document. Zhanna brilliantly and professionally translated everything very fast and accurate.
When I needed to translate another complicated document my friend suggested to use a cheaper translation company located in Russia. But because a Russian translator lives in Russia and not in the English speaking country, his choice of English words was not accurate and the quality of translation was low. I had to ask Zhanna to correct obtained translation that she did perfectly, accurately and fast.
From my personal experience Zhanna is the best option for Russian to English translation. I am very happy with her translation service and highly recommend Zhana.

originalText.text:
I needed to translate my medical records from Russian into English. Zhanna and her team accurately translated my documents within 2 days. This company deserves five stars for customer service and efficiency. I will definitely use their services again.

~Maryna
